entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Terra Nova (National Park)

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 10:30 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to flurries in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
